TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_tadamicidekay_a_imelang_nu_baluwang, title = tadamicidekay_a_imelang_nu_baluwang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/tadamicidekay_a_imelang_nu_baluwang} }

S.FORM: == kakaliman == tadamicidekay a imelang nu baluwang肺癌 musaciid i baluwang tu ledeb palamit a mulahad mucelek, anu caay paiyu i sa, mangaleb pilahad tatacuwa, u matalay nu mitaaidas, miledek ku edes, talabangs amulahad, sa adidik a misengi ya katinenga i tasa, mahihiuh, u ti'ih ku udip, muhanhan a dada ku bauuwang makudus tu. 85% katineng nu siimelangay sa namu tabakuway a tademaw, 10%-15% na caay pitabak u duma sa, namakay baba lakiyaimalalid, makahelip tuangliway bali, anabuh saka tusa a tabaku, idaunay misakupaay, sasingn ku baluwang, masametek kiyamicidek kaya imelang. 大多數(85%) X光或斷層掃描(CT) CT引導下進行活檢確診. milawaay tu hanhan, 1.mahihhih 2.siisdang 3.masuni 4.u tiih ku hanhan. sakay udip, 1.makudus 2.masiyan 3.akuti' 4.makelulup ku kakanus. cidekay anu masakatil tu, 1.adada ku baluwang 2.adada ku ukak. 3.mipuet tu sahanhan. 4.utiih sae'nuc. anu i hahan'hana kiy cidekay sa amapu'et ku hanhan nu misu tu malawa' ku ta'en u cawa misu, anu masaupu ku tuutuud i talulaw sa, apihaceng tu masied kiyabala' kiya.

== kakaliman == tadamicidekay a imelang no balowang肺癌 mosaciid i balowang to ledeb palamit a molahad mocelek, ano caay paiyo i sa, mangaleb pilahad tatacowa, o matalay no mitaaidas, miledek ko edes, talabangs amolahad, sa adidik a misengi ya katinenga i tasa, mahihioh, o ti'ih ko odip, mohanhan a dada ko baoowang makodos to. 85% katineng no siimelangay sa namo tabakoway a tademaw, 10%-15% na caay pitabak o doma sa, namakay baba lakiyaimalalid, makahelip toangliway bali, anaboh saka tosa a tabako, idaonay misakopaay, sasingn ko balowang, masametek kiyamicidek kaya imelang. 大多數(85%) X光或斷層掃描(CT) CT引導下進行活檢確診. milawaay to hanhan, 1.mahihhih 2.siisdang 3.masoni 4.o tiih ko hanhan. sakay odip, 1.makodos 2.masiyan 3.akoti' 4.makelolop ko kakanos. cidekay ano masakatil to, 1.adada ko balowang 2.adada ko okak. 3.mipoet to sahanhan. 4.otiih sae'noc. ano i hahan'hana kiy cidekay sa amapo'et ko hanhan no miso to malawa' ko ta'en o cawa miso, ano masaopo ko tootood i talolaw sa, apihaceng to masied kiyabala' kiya.
